valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 964 moving steady eastwards, expected 300 miles west of Bailey 980 by midday tomorrow
